name: Bearing With Diabetes: Type 1
description:
Submission for Kansas State 2nd Annual Game Jam

Theme: A game to help educate people and empower them to manage diabetes.

Help a bear defeat candy while managing his type 1 diabetes and experiencing the symptoms.

By Jeff Cook (Programming, Gameplay), Carson Holt (Level Design, Art), Cal Fletcher (Writing, Story), Mark Williams (Art, Research)
